pageTitle: Download CDL Help - Free CDL Practice Test App
pageDescription: Download the CDL Help app for iOS and Android. Practice CDL tests in multiple languages with over 1000 questions. Get ready for your Commercial Driver's License exam with our free mobile app.
heroTitle: Get CDL Help on Your Phone
heroDescription: [AR] Practice CDL tests anytime, anywhere with our mobile app. Available in 8 languages with over 1000 questions to help you pass your Commercial Driver's License exam.
whyChooseDescription: [AR] Everything you need to pass your CDL exam in one app
multilingualSupportDesc: [AR] Study in your preferred language with support for 8 languages including English, Spanish, Russian, and more.
comprehensiveQuestionsDesc: [AR] Access our extensive database covering all CDL test categories including General Knowledge, Air Brakes, and Hazmat.
progressTrackingDesc: [AR] Monitor your improvement with detailed statistics and identify areas that need more practice.
examSimulationDesc: [AR] Practice with questions that closely match the actual DMV exam format and difficulty level.
screenshotsDescription: [AR] Get a preview of our intuitive interface and powerful features
screenshotAlt3: [AR] CDL Help test results and progress
ctaTitle: [AR] Ready to Pass Your CDL Exam?
ctaDescription: [AR] Join thousands of successful truck drivers who prepared with CDL Help
